27 
28 int main(int argc, char** argv)
29 {
30 
31  ros::init(argc, argv, "odometry");
32 
33  ros::NodeHandle nh;
34  // object needed to send odometric information to the navigational stack
35  tf::TransformBroadcaster odomBroadcaster;
36  geometry_msgs::TransformStamped odomTransform;
37  nav_msgs::Odometry odom;
38  geometry_msgs::Quaternion odomQuaternion;
39  // object neeeded to store the current commands
40  sensor_msgs::Imu imu;
41  std_msgs::Int16 motor;
42  std_msgs::UInt8 hallCnt;
43  std_msgs::Float64 hallDt;
44  // objects needed for odometric calculations
45  OdometryHelper odomHelper;
46  // Publishes the results of the odometry calculations to other ros nodes
47  ros::Publisher odomPub = nh.advertise<nav_msgs::Odometry>("odom", 10);
48  ros::Subscriber imuSub = nh.subscribe<sensor_msgs::Imu>("/uc_bridge/imu", 10, boost::bind(imuCallback,_1,&imu));
49  ros::Subscriber motorSub = nh.subscribe<std_msgs::Int16>("/uc_bridge/set_motor_level_msg", 1, boost::bind(motorCallback,_1,&motor));
50  ros::Subscriber hallCntSub = nh.subscribe<std_msgs::UInt8>("/uc_bridge/hall_cnt", 10, boost::bind(hallCntCallback,_1,&hallCnt));
51  ros::Subscriber hallDtSub = nh.subscribe<std_msgs::Float64>("/uc_bridge/hall_dt", 10, boost::bind(hallDtCallback,_1,&hallDt));
52 
53  // Loop starts here:
54  ros::Rate loop_rate(150);
55  while (ros::ok())
56  {
57  // feed the kinematic model with sensor data, to predict location
58  odomHelper.updateSensorData(imu, hallDt.data, motor.data);
59  odomHelper.getQuaternion(odomQuaternion);
60 
61  // build odometry transform
62  odomTransform.header.stamp = ros::Time::now();
63  odomTransform.header.frame_id = "odom";
64  odomTransform.child_frame_id = "base_footprint";
65  odomTransform.transform.translation.x = odomHelper.getPosition().x;
66  odomTransform.transform.translation.y = odomHelper.getPosition().y;
67  odomTransform.transform.translation.z = 0.0;
68  odomTransform.transform.rotation = odomQuaternion;
69 
70  // build odometry message
71  odom.header.stamp = ros::Time::now();
72  odom.header.frame_id = "odom";
73  odom.pose.pose.position = odomHelper.getPosition();
74  odom.pose.pose.orientation = odomQuaternion;
75  odom.child_frame_id = "base_footprint";
76  odom.twist.twist.linear.x = odomHelper.getVx();
77  odom.twist.twist.linear.y = odomHelper.getVy();
78  odom.twist.twist.angular.z = odomHelper.getWz();
79 
80  odomPub.publish(odom);
81  odomBroadcaster.sendTransform(odomTransform);
82 
83  ros::spinOnce();
84  loop_rate.sleep();
85  }
86 
87  ros::spin();
88 
89  return 0;
90 }
